data.title: Compare any countries
data.meta_description: Comparison between countries based on population, economy, energy, religions, languages and other data.
data.text:
Country comparison

Please select the countries to compare:

Compare any countries with each other. All essential statistical data on the countries will be displayed in tabular form.

The most common comparisons

India : United States of America

India : Pakistan

Australia : United States of America

France : United Kingdom

United Kingdom : United States of America

Australia : India

Australia : United Kingdom

Bangladesh : India

Canada : United States of America

India : South Korea

Our country comparison shows an excerpt of the most relevant data from two countries. Various subject areas such as population, economy or languages are presented with the latest data available to us. All areas are provided with links to the detail page of the respective country so that you can quickly find additional information. We have also provided individual subpages for each country on numerous topics, where you can find further and more detailed information.
